Filmography

The Wind Rises
Hayao Miyazaki, 2013

The Tale of Princess Kaguya
Isao Takahata, 2013

From Up On Poppy Hill
Goro Miyazaki, 2011

Ponyo
Hayao Miyazaki, 2008

Tales from Earthsea
Goro Miyazaki, 2006

Howl's Moving Castle
Hayao Miyazaki, 2004

Spirited Away
Hayao Miyazaki, 2001

My Neighbor The Yamadas
Isao Takahata, 1999

Princess Mononoke
Hayao Miyazaki, 1997
